repl_description:
A web-based prayer coordination platform enabling SFU Muslim students to organize and participate in prayer meetups. The system features user authentication, real-time prayer meetup management, automated prayer times calculation specific to SFU's location, integrated group chat functionality for prayer rooms, and an Islamic Events calendar with Hijri date support. The platform is implemented as a Progressive Web App (PWA) with offline functionality, offering installable capabilities across devices.

The platform implements real-time communication for both meetup coordination and group messaging through WebSocket connections. Core functionalities include user authentication, prayer time calculations, room-specific chat capabilities, and tracking of upcoming Islamic events.

Tech Stack:
- TypeScript-based architecture
- React frontend with TSX components
- Progressive Web App (PWA) with service workers
- WebSocket for real-time updates and chat
- RESTful API routing
- User authentication system
- Adhan.js for prayer times calculation
- Moment-hijri for Islamic calendar calculations
- PrayerChat component for room messaging
- IslamicEvents component for events tracking
